DOC.detailed_description: This single-arm study evaluate safety efficacy combination fludarabine 25 mg/m2/d IV cyclophosphamide 250 mg/m2/d SC previously untreated CLL patient . Participants receive fludarabine cyclophosphamide day 1 , 2 , 3 six 28-day cycle , follow no-treatment rest period ( observation ) 3 12 week . Responders enter no-treatment rest period ( observation ) 3 8 week , depend status , continue follow-up on-study receive Campath state 3 mg/day dose adjust maximum tolerated dose .
